name: int2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wvd1(wvhc2(w0, w1), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd1(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wvd1(wvhc2(w0, w1), w2)

comment: The virtual deduction introduction rule of converting the end virtual hypothesis of 2 virtual hypotheses into an antecedent. Conventional form of ~ int2 is ~ ex . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 23-Apr-2015.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
